29  MotorModule::MotorModule(Bus& canbus, const uint8_t moduleId) :
30  m_ModuleId(moduleId),
31  m_Bus(canbus),
32  m_bIsRunning(true),
33  m_pWriteThread(nullptr),

37  m_CurrentTimeStamp(0),

68  void MotorModule::Stop()
69  {
70  m_bIsRunning = false;
71  if (m_pWriteThread != nullptr)
72  {
73  m_pWriteThread->join();
74  delete m_pWriteThread;
75  m_pWriteThread = nullptr;
76  }
77  }
78 
80  void MotorModule::Start()
81  {
82  m_bIsRunning = true;
83  m_pWriteThread = new std::thread(WriteThread, this);
84  }

88  uint8_t MotorModule::get_ModuleId() const
89  {
90  return m_ModuleId;
91  }

95  void MotorModule::WriteThread(MotorModule * pModule)
96  {
97  pModule->WriteLoop();
98  }
99 
101  void MotorModule::WriteLoop()
102  {
103  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread started.");
104  while (m_bIsRunning)
105  {
106  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point last=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
107  set_DesiredPosition(m_MotorPosition+m_MotorIncrement);
108  Command_SetJoint(m_MotorPosition, m_DIO);
109  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point current=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
110  int64_t ms=(std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(current - last)).count();
111  if(ms<50)
112  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(m_UpdateInterval-ms));
113  }
114  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Write thread terminating.");
115  }
116 
119  int32_t MotorModule::get_DesiredPosition() const
120  {
121  return m_MotorPosition;
122  }
123 
126  void MotorModule::set_DesiredPosition(const int32_t ticks)
127  {
128  m_MotorPosition = ticks;
129  int32_t M=std::max(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition); // values of min and max may be swapped if gear ratios are negative
130  int32_t m=std::min(m_MotorMinPosition,m_MotorMaxPosition);
131  if(m_MotorPosition<m)
132  {
133  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to minium of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,m);
134  m_MotorPosition=m;
135  }
136  if(m_MotorPosition>M)
137  {
138  ROS_INFO("Module %u: Clamping position %i to maximum of %i ticks.",m_ModuleId,m_MotorPosition,M);
139  m_MotorPosition=M;
140  }
141  }
142 
147  double MotorModule::get_UpdateInterval() const
148  {
149  return 0.001*(double)m_UpdateInterval;
150  }
151 
152 
156  void MotorModule::Command_SetJoint(const int32_t ticks, const uint8_t dio)
157  {
158  struct can_frame frame;
159  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
160  frame.can_dlc = 8;
161  frame.data[0] = 0x14;
162  frame.data[1] = 0x00;
163  int32_t positionWithOffset=ticks+m_MotorPositionOffset;
164  frame.data[2] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0xFF000000u) >> 24;
165  frame.data[3] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x00FF0000u) >> 16;
166  frame.data[4] = (((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x0000FF00u) >> 8;
167  frame.data[5] = ((uint32_t)positionWithOffset) & 0x000000FFu;
168  frame.data[6] = m_CurrentTimeStamp;
169  m_CurrentTimeStamp=(uint8_t)((((uint32_t)m_CurrentTimeStamp)+1)&0xFF);
170  frame.data[7] = dio;
171  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
172  }
173 
175  void MotorModule::Command_ResetError()
176  {
177  struct can_frame frame;
178  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
179  frame.can_dlc = 2;
180  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
181  frame.data[1] = 0x06;
182  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
183  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
184  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
185  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
186  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
187  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
188  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
189  }

193  {
194  struct can_frame frame;
195  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
196  frame.can_dlc = 2;
197  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
198  frame.data[1] = 0x0a;
199  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
200  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
201  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
202  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
203  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
204  frame.data[7] = 0x00;
205  m_Bus.WriteFrame(frame);
206  }

243  void MotorModule::Command_SetZeroPosition()
244  {
245  struct can_frame frame;
246  frame.can_id = (canid_t)(m_ModuleId << 4);
247  frame.can_dlc = 4;
248  frame.data[0] = 0x01;
249  frame.data[1] = 0x08;
250  frame.data[2] = 0x00;
251  frame.data[3] = 0x00;
252  frame.data[4] = 0x00;
253  frame.data[5] = 0x00;
254  frame.data[6] = 0x00;
255  frame.data[7] = 0x00;

268  int32_t MotorModule::get_CurrentPosition(uint8_t& timeStamp, std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point& receptionTime, uint8_t& errorFlags, uint8_t& dataBits) const
269  {
270  const canid_t id = (canid_t)((m_ModuleId << 4) + 1);
271  bool bValid=false;
272  struct can_frame frame = m_Bus.get_LastFrame(id, receptionTime, bValid);
273  if(bValid)
274  {
275  timeStamp=(uint8_t)frame.data[5];
276  errorFlags=(uint8_t)frame.data[0];
277  dataBits=(uint8_t)frame.data[7];
278  return ((int32_t)((((uint32_t)frame.data[1]) << 24) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[2]) << 16) | (((uint32_t)frame.data[3]) << 8) | ((uint32_t)frame.data[4])))-m_MotorPositionOffset;
279  }
280  else
281  {
282  receptionTime=std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::now();
283  errorFlags=0x00;
284  dataBits=0x00;
285  return 0;
286  }
287  }
288 
290  void MotorModule::Enable()
291  {
292  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Enabling motor.");
293  Command_ResetError();
294  uint8_t timeStamp;
295  uint8_t errorFlags;
296  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
297  uint8_t dataBits;
298  int32_t real = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
299  m_MotorPosition = real;
300  Command_EnableMotor();
301  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
302  Command_EnableMotor();
303  }
304 
306  void MotorModule::Disable()
307  {
308  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Disabling motor.");
309  Command_DisableMotor();
310  }
311 
313  void MotorModule::StartReferencing()
314  {
315  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Referencing started.");
316  Command_StartReferencing();
317  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
318  Command_StartReferencing();
319  }
320 
322  void MotorModule::SetZero()
323  {
324  ROS_INFO("Module %u: %s",m_ModuleId, "Setting to zero.");
325  Command_SetZeroPosition();
326  std::this_thread::sleep_for (std::chrono::milliseconds(20));
327  Command_SetZeroPosition();
328  uint8_t timeStamp;
329  uint8_t errorFlags;
330  std::chrono::high_resolution_clock::time_point updateTime;
331  uint8_t dataBits;
332  m_MotorPosition = get_CurrentPosition(timeStamp, updateTime, errorFlags, dataBits);
333  }
